command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.contactDetails.emailList" options="email-list" group="ContactDetails">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.contactDetails.notificationPreference" options="notification-preference" hide="True" group="ContactDetails">

<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails" options="data-export-details" group="Details">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.azureFileFilterDetails.filePathList" options="file-path-list">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.azureFileFilterDetails.filePrefixList" options="file-prefix-list">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.azureFileFilterDetails.fileShareList" options="file-share-list">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.blobFilterDetails.blobPathList" options="blob-path-list">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.blobFilterDetails.blobPrefixList" options="blob-prefix-list">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.blobFilterDetails.containerList" options="container-list">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.filterFileDetails" options="filter-file-details" group="Include">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.dataImportDetails" options="data-import-details" group="Details">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.preferences.preferredDataCenterRegion" options="preferred-data-center-region">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResource.properties.details.preferences.storageAccountAccessTierPreferences" options="storage-account-access-tier-preferences">

help.short: The location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical region is specified on update the request will succeed.
The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups).
Managed identity properties used for key encryption.
Arm resource id for user assigned identity to be used to fetch MSI token.
Type of encryption key used for key encryption.
Key encryption key. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.
Kek vault resource id. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.
Name of the State or Province.
The display name of the sku.

The customer friendly name of the combination of version and capacity of the device. This field is necessary only at the time of ordering the newer generation device i.e. AzureDataBox120 and AzureDataBox525 as of Feb/2025

json.schema:
<userAssigned action="create" type="array" name="userAssigned" arg="$jobResource.identity.userAssigned">
<prop type="array" name="emailList" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.contactDetails.emailList" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="notificationPreference" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.contactDetails.notificationPreference">
<prop type="array" name="dataExportDetails" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails">
<prop type="array" name="filePathList" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.azureFileFilterDetails.filePathList">
<prop type="array" name="filePrefixList" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.azureFileFilterDetails.filePrefixList">
<prop type="array" name="fileShareList" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.azureFileFilterDetails.fileShareList">
<prop type="array" name="blobPathList" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.blobFilterDetails.blobPathList">
<prop type="array" name="blobPrefixList" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.blobFilterDetails.blobPrefixList">
<prop type="array" name="containerList" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.blobFilterDetails.containerList">
<prop type="array" name="filterFileDetails" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataExportDetails[].transferConfiguration.transferFilterDetails.include.filterFileDetails">
<prop type="array" name="dataImportDetails" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.dataImportDetails">
<prop type="array" name="preferredDataCenterRegion" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.preferences.preferredDataCenterRegion">
<prop type="array" name="storageAccountAccessTierPreferences" arg="$jobResource.properties.details.preferences.storageAccountAccessTierPreferences">

command.name: update

help.short: Defines the If-Match condition. The patch will be performed only if the ETag of the job on the server matches this value.
The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$jobResourceUpdateParameter.properties.details.contactDetails.emailList" options="email-list" group="ContactDetails">
<arg type="array" var="$jobResourceUpdateParameter.properties.details.contactDetails.notificationPreference" options="notification-preference" hide="True" group="ContactDetails">

help.short: The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups).
Managed identity properties used for key encryption.
Arm resource id for user assigned identity to be used to fetch MSI token.
Type of encryption key used for key encryption.
Key encryption key. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.
Kek vault resource id. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.
Name of the State or Province.
